comment: Great lab instructor. Offers all the help you need. Lenient grader. I highly recommend her!

Serbansecu is very nice and willing to help. However, she has a very thick accent which may be difficult for some people. She grades fair and makes sure you understand where you missed points on the lab. 1212 Lab is a lot longer and harder than 1211 and she made it the adjustment easier.

Serbanescu is amazing! She is understanding and lenient and makes everything crystal clear. I would take her for every class if I could. The final is hard, but it's standardized, so it isn't her fault. But she curves. RECOMMEND TAKING HER OVER ANYONE IF YOU CAN!
Labs are easy (make sure you put correct significant figures). she is nice and will try to answer your questions. This class took up a lot of my time outside of class.

Great teacher, outlines lab before hand and answers any question you have about the lab to the point where she is almost doing it for you. I recommend her for anyone who isnt very strong in chemistry or if you want to get a nice grade on your transcript.

Lab reports themselves are tedious, but Serbanescu is wonderful at helping you to understand what it is you need. She grades almost too easily, so I highly recommend her if your chemistry is not too strong and you need a good grade. Not to mention, she is probably the most kind-hearted and forgiving professor I have ever had.

this class was not hard whatsoever. She is an easy and fair grader, and will answer any questions and explain everything. It is hard to not make at least a B in this class. the labs are longer than 1211 labs
